name: Jongro Boutique
description: Jongro Boutique (JOBT) aims to address the problem of scattered information in the beauty industry by creating a revolutionary database focused on consumer needs. The vision is to enhance the connection between consumers and suppliers, establishing a new ecosystem. The database will consolidate detailed information on beauty product origins, ingredients, and production processes, promoting transparency and helping consumers access reliable product information. JOBT token within Jongro Boutique serves diverse purposes, providing brands with vital consumer insights. The platform utilizes blockchain data to meet brand needs, allowing consumers to collect skincare-related commerce data. The JOBT app features a token reward system with roles in ad management, banner video rewards, and beauty DB collection. It operates as a User Engagement app with functions like beauty DB collection, redistribution, games, referrals, and displaying beauty products. Unlike traditional Web2 structures, JOBT introduces a user reward system that increases with usage, creating a circular system where rewards and company operations are interconnected through DB utilization. JOBT marks a pioneering step in this integrated system.
